title: Inquiry-Based Learning Program for Strengthening Water Resource Expert Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Hydrology, water resource management fundamentals, and practical experience
context.additional_context: Necessity for national-level water resource policy and technology integration capacity development.

learning_goals: Integrated knowledge from diverse academic disciplines can be used to design strategies for solving complex water resource problems.
System thinking can be applied to analyze the interconnections of water management policies and generate visual representations.
Proposals can be written to communicate effectively with diverse stakeholders (policymakers, field experts, etc.).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
